mapper.insert: insert into USERS (USER_ID, PK_GENDER, USER_PWD, CHECK_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTH, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_PERMISSION) values (#{USERNAME}, #{GENDER}, #{USER_PWD}, #{CHECK_PWD}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_EMAIL}, #{USER_BIRTH}, #{USER_PHONE}, #{USER_ADDRESS}, #{USER_PERMISSION}) ;
